description:
Looking for an off-piste waterproof ski pant with advanced movement and breathability? Their new Khroma Kinetic Pant with high-stretch, waterproof Proflex™ is purpose-built for ski mountaineers who love the up as much as the down.

Their multi-purpose Khroma Kinetic Pant is designed to satisfy every element of your big mountain adventure. Built from new 3-layer Proflex™ fabric, it uses a DWR-coated outer with a tough, woven face and a water-repellancy rating of 20000mm HH for extreme weather protection. The high-gauge inner knit also wicks away moisture fast and, with integrated elastane, the ‘soft’ hardshell texture offers all the mobility you need for technical climbs and high-energy descents. For additional mountain utility, the Khroma Kinetic Pant features ski-ready pockets, an adjustable waist, side-venting zips, removable braces and reinforced kick patches for ski buckles and edges.

Soft, reliable and liberating, the waterproof Khroma Kinetic Pant has the flexibility and moisture management to change the way you layer for high-energy pursuits in mixed mountain weather.
name: Rab Khroma Kinetic Pants, Reg - Mens
